direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods manage the composition of maps, but one adds while the other removes.
Both methods involve adding elements to the composite structure, though one adds a map and the other adds a key-value pair.
Both methods involve adding multiple elements to the composite structure, though one adds a map and the other adds a collection of key-value pairs.
Both methods handle exceptions related to unsupported operations on the composited maps.
Both methods access the composite maps to perform operations, though one checks for key presence and the other modifies the composition.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the initialization of the composite map structure.
Environment setup is required before adding a map to the composite.
Both methods verify the structure of the composite and handle similar exceptions.
